section.heading: Notice.
section.text: Pursuant to rules issued in accordance with § 42-2104, the Mayor shall give:

para.text: Reasonable advance notice to the record owners and affected parties of properties brought to tax sale in accordance with § 47-1205(b) and (c); and

Reasonable advance notice of properties scheduled to be sold and the date of sale by advertising the list of properties in a newspaper of general circulation published in the District of Columbia at least once every 2 weeks.
